PipeSegmentBaseAdapter Class Reference

Provides an empty implementation (adapter) on the IPipeSegmentBaseAdapter. More...

Detailed Description

Provides an empty implementation (adapter) on the IPipeSegmentBaseAdapter.

This is an adapter class (class with empty implementation on all methods defined by an interface) on the IPipeSegmentBase interface.
